tool.name: mulled_example_multi_1
tool.command:
bedtools --version > '$out_file1' && echo "Moo" >> '$out_file1' && samtools >> '$out_file1' 2>&1 && echo "Cow" >> '$out_file1' &&
touch "\${TMP:-/tmp}/job_tmp" && touch "\${TEMP:-/tmp}/job_temp" && touch "\${TMPDIR:-/tmp}/job_tmpdir"
tool.help: This is an example mulled tool that combines bedtools and samtools in one command-line invocation.
